info.name: uqpay-openapi
info.description:
UQPAY Openapi official supported Postman collections.

API documents: https://docs.uqpay.org/introduction

query.description:
Filter on currency of the balance.
Three-letter ISO 4217 currency code.

Filter on status of the balance.
One of all, active, closed
Fuzzy search by name of the balance.

Number of results per page.
Maximum 50
Open card, Recharge or Withdraw orderIds, provider before

Filter on status of cardholder.
One of -1=FAILED, 0-PENDING, 1-SUCCESS, 2-INCOMPLETE
Fuzzy search by name of the cardholder.

request.description: Authenticates and authorizes a user to the UQPAY API. The authentication token is required to make requests to all other endpoints in the UQPAY API. Tokens expire after 10 minutes of inactivity.
